narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Village Mentors is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Mesa, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $6.2M in Medicaid payments across 4K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $6.2M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
